articles.author: Corpus Christi, Madlin Mekelburg and John C Moritz, Corpus Christi
articles.title: The history of mass shootings in Texas
articles.description: The modern era of mass killings started on a summer day in 1966 when Charles Whitman climbed the tower at the University of Texas at Austin and began shooting. Since then eight mass killings have taken the lives of 100 people and injured about 140.

articles.author: Mike Hixenbaugh, Lomi Kriel
articles.title: Protests continue as Trump administration moves to reunite separated families - Chron.com
articles.description:
Kristen Ruiz has never thought of herself as an activist. But one night last week, as the stay-at-home mother of three  rocked her 17-month-old  to sleep, she was overcome with sadness and anger at the thought of the government taking her children from her.
